title: Response to Mark of Discipleship
text: In closing, compose a Personal Prayer in response to your learning. It can be anything you feel God has impressed upon your heart or mind. This can be a prayer of praise, of thankfulness, of desired change, of confession, of repentance, etc. You will always have an opportunity to make any updates to your Personal Prayer before we close our group meeting since you may have new thoughts as a result of our discussions. You will be asked to pray your Personal Prayer aloud when we close our group meeting.
question: For this weekâ€™s prayer, you might consider places in your life that call for repentance.
